description:
This month we are joining forces with Agile Bath and Bristol Meetup to host an evening of productive chaos with Lyndsay Prewer from Equal Experts.

Lyndsay will be talking about "Embracing collaborative chaos - running chaos days on large platforms"

Please register on their Meetup page at https://www.meetup.com/Agile-Bath-Bristol/events/268824447/

We look forward to seeing you there
title: Joint meeting with the Agile Bath and Bristol Meetup
